name: Global Daily Deal Association
description: Daily Deal,  Group Buying Trade associat
overview:
The Global Daily Deal Association (GDDA) is the trade organization for the daily deal industry.

Following huge demand at the DD Summit Europe, the GDDA has been established to bring together the thousands of daily deal providers currently offering discounted goods and services to consumer across the globe.

The association’s aims will be to facilitate collaboration on industry initiatives and standardize approaches to this young and developing sales channel. The organization will also coordinate conferences and networking events for the Industry to share best practice, building on the success of the first ever DD Summit Europe in March 2012.
